content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the panevėžys district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between the applicant dv and the defendant mv the court awarded half of the property including a land plot dwelling house outbuilding farm building garage and courtyard buildings to each party the court also awarded the applicant a volvo v70 car worth €2000 the court ordered the applicant to pay the defendant €1000 as compensation for the higher value of the property awarded the court declared that a credit obligation owed to a credit union should be repaid by both parties according to the agreement the applicant is seeking to dissolve their marriage with the defendant and establish the place of residence for their three children they are also requesting child support and the division of immovable property the defendant has not yet submitted a reply the authority involved in the case supports the applicants claims regarding the childrens place of residence and child support the authority also agrees with the applicants request for usufruct of the defendants share of the property the court partially grants the application including granting a divorce determining the childrens place of residence and dividing the property the defendant is ordered to pay certain costs and the decision regarding maintenance is subject to immediate execution the court orders the defendant to pay half of the value of the property and €2000 for the car the applicant is ordered to compensate the defendant with €1000 the court also declares that there is an obligation owed to a credit union and that it should be repaid by both parties the defendant is ordered to pay stamp duty and stateguaranteed legal aid costs

metadata.cost: 328.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 248.84 EUR (professional fees) + 18.59 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
